divs: sighting detailsa ufo keeps appearing every night for the last 5 nights around the time of 8pm to 11 pm next to a field off becker road in port st. lucie. i did not see the incidents but rumors are going around by many towns people. it is hovering for quite a while almost nightly. it has become a rather big turn out at night. mind you this is second hand information. i did not see this first hand, but i am going to drive down to see this tonight. if true i will give you follow up details. also on another note at 9am on 2\20\2007 two sonic booms shook st. lucie county. no con trails were detected but it was two loud bangs that sounded like someone jumped onto the roof of our house. all the neighbors are talking about it. it was heard all the way to vero beach florida.
